attributes.action: Have a Percentage of your Final exam grade assessed by your teacher
attributes.additional_details: I don’t think exams are the best way of assessing someone’s intelligence in a subject, what if you aren’t feeling yourself on exam day or you struggle putting you thoughts into writing? Rather, what if a percentage of your final grade was decided by your teacher. This would not only provide a margin in the exam, making it less stressful but it would discourage laziness in class improving student’s work ethic and help prepare them for post-school life.
attributes.background: Make it compulsory for a certain percentage (preferably around the 30% mark) of a student’s final grade in a subject to be decided by the teacher of said subject.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want a teacher assessment to account for part of a student's grade, but it's not clear for what years you want this to apply.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
